title: Technology Addiction - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/21/20
itunes:title: Technology Addiction - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/21/20
description:
George Noory and author Alexander Weinstein explore his collection of stories dealing with computers and technology, whether technology is designed to become addictive, and how modern children who have spent their entire lives using social media and video games will adjust to the future.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
